H0.text: What animal kills more Americans than any other. Deer

H1.text: What animal kills more Americans than any other. Dog

H2.text: What animal kills more Americans than any other. Horse

H3.text: What animal kills more Americans than any other. Bee

A4.text: Between 2011 and 2021 approximately 468 people were killed by dog bites in the United States, averaging 43 deaths per year.

A5.text: Animal bites, most of which are from dogs, are the reason for 1% of visits to emergency departments in the United States.
